title: Executive Order 11199-Discontinuing the Defensive Sea Area Off the Coast of North Carolina
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by Section 2152 of Title 18 of the United States Code, and as President of the United States, it is ordered as follows:
Section 1. The defensive sea area off the coast of North Carolina, heretofore existing under the provisions of Executive Order No. 5786 of January 30, 1932, is hereby discontinued.
Sec. 2. Executive Order No. 5786 of January 30, 1932, is hereby revoked.
citation: Lyndon B. Johnson, Executive Order 11199-Discontinuing the Defensive Sea Area Off the Coast of North Carolina Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/239195
